pullRequest.title: Rename DeckTask to CollectionTask
pullRequest.bodyText:
This class was created in 2009. If I understand code history correctly
"Deck" has been renamed to "Collection" and what is called "deck"
today is totally distinct.
This commit was done using android studio, so I am quite confident it
did not miss anything. And I hope it'll make the code slightly less
confusing for newcomers. (I actually lost 5 minutes trying to figure
out where to put an async task for a non deck-related task)

commit.message:
Rename DeckTask to CollectionTask

This class was created in 2009. If I understand code history correctly
"Deck" has been renamed to "Collection" and what is called "deck"
today is totally distinct.

This commit was done using android studio, so I am quite confident it
did not miss anything. And I hope it'll make the code slightly less
confusing for newcomers. (I actually lost 5 minutes trying to figure
out where to put an async task for a non deck-related task)

nodes.bodyText: Issue found: Avoid really long classes.
Issue found: Fields should be declared at the top of the class, before any method declarations, constructors, initializers or inner classes.
